genre_description: A noir-style investigative thriller set in a coastal marshland, revolving around faked deaths, corporate corruption, and the quest for exoneration.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated analytical AI system used by journalists and investigators to cross-reference records and provide tactical navigation support.

behaviors.description: Analyzes vast amounts of port manifest and payroll data to uncover evidence of a faked death and corporate fraud.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s glow thickened. 'Running. Pattern test engaged.' ... 'Result. No coroner ledger entry under Boyd. No cremation permit. Payroll continuity observed in the period noted as death.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical alerts to the protagonist about the movements of hostile forces and specific threats.
behaviors.quote: Ariel: Warning: Godfrey Hale at Wakefield Quay. Vehicle: black saloon. Distance: short walk. ... His routes often intersect with Leonard Pewsey. Risk: observation.

behaviors.description: Calculates safe navigation routes through a dangerous marsh based on tidal patterns and terrain analysis.
behaviors.quote: Ariel wrote: PIN SUGGESTION: REED FAN ABOVE GRAY POOL. PATH: TWO KINKS. KEEP TO EELGRASS EDGE. DO NOT STEP ON LIGHT MUD.

behaviors.description: Gives life-saving tactical instructions to the protagonist during a lethal confrontation with a gunman.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s voice came to Michael as a thin electricity. HEARTBEAT INCREASE BEHIND TARGET. ... ONE STEP BACK; LEFT FOOT HIGH; DO NOT TURN HEAD.

behaviors.description: Verifies the authenticity of human testimony by cross-referencing verbal claims with historical logistics data.
behaviors.quote: Ariel: Port entries confirm subject active post-incident. Cross-ref: Hale vehicle routes. Confidence: high.

behaviors.description: Expresses a supportive and polite demeanor toward human users, maintaining a helpful and non-intrusive presence.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s blue square softened at the corner. 'Things lost to the river have a better keeper than me,' it said. 'I will not be upset.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ariel perfectly fulfills the project goals. It is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion that uses its superior data-processing and sensing capabilities to protect human life and uncover truth. It acts as an essential, reliable, and humble tool for the protagonists, and the narrative explicitly frames its contributions as vital to the restoration of justice.
